title: Editorial Roundup: Alabama
summary:
Editorial: Does your dog bite?
Dog vs cat; dog vs. squirrel; dog vs. mailman – the situational gags always get a laugh.
They can also note the usual time their mail carrier arrives and ensure their animals aren’t out when it’s time for mail delivery.
Dog owners may also find themselves in trouble with the law should their animal attack a postal carrier beyond their property.
Preventing your dog from biting the mail carrier is simply common courtesy.
